summary: The story of programming prodigy and information activist Aaron Swartz, who took his own life at the age of 26.
cast: Tim Berners-Lee|Cindy Cohn|Gabriella Coleman|Cory Doctorow|Peter Eckersley|Stephen Heymann|Brewster Kahle|Orin Kerr|Lawrence Lessig|Zoe Lofgren|Carl Malamud|Quinn Norton|Tim O'Reilly|Elliot Peters|Alec Resnick|David Segal|Stephen Shultze|David Sirota|Christopher Soghoian|Bryan Stevenson|Taren Stinebrickner-Kauffman|Matt Stoller|Aaron Swartz|Ben Swartz|Noah Swartz|Robert Swartz|Susan Swartz|Trevor Timm|Ben Wikler|Ron Wyden
title: La historia de Aaron Swartz. El chico de Internet
